document.full_text: a russian court will begin considering ex-tycoon mikhail khodorkovsky's appeal against his conviction on multi-billion-dollar theft and money laundering charges on may 17, a court official said on wednesday.
document.title: khodorkovsky appeal set for may 17: russian court
lines_and_colors: a russian court will begin considering ex-tycoon mikhail khodorkovsky's appeal against his conviction on multi-billion-dollar theft and money laundering charges on may 17, a court official said on wednesday.
